https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j0v97E4MMshuIgRbfrD4Ntqy2v5.jpg A reclusive spinster abducts a pregnant woman to steal her baby. What she doesn't know is that a ruthless murderer is out to kill the mother-to-be. A dark thriller in the spirit of "Misery" and "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" A Stone in the Water
